name: Idle Beauty Salon Clicker
description:
Makeover, hairstyle, nails — these services are always in demand. Create your idle beauty salon business and help people look beautiful!

Start with a few hairdresser masters, teach them new haircuts and improve their skills. The cooler the hairstyle they can do, the more money you make. Make your masters and barbers the best top stylists!

Nail design or nail art is an integral part of any modern beauty salon. All visitors want the perfect manicure and polish. Your masters definitely can help them and at the same time bring a lot of money to your idle beauty salon.

Don’t forget to hire and level up the cashiers. Сustomers don’t like to wait long in line to pay. If they are happy, they will tell other people about your beauty salon and your style business will flourish.

As a good manager, you understand that the business needs to be developed. Why not become a spa salon? Makeup or nail art can’t replace good health. Open a massage parlor in your beauty salon to help customers be even more beautiful and healthy.

Create your style empire from a small beauty salon and become the successful businessman or businesswoman in this idle simulator!
